mapper.select: SELECT QNA_NO, MEMBER_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_HIT, QNA_CREATED, QNA_MODIFIED FROM QNA ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC LIMIT #{beginRecord}, #{recordPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (MEMBER_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_HIT, QNA_CREATED ,QNA_MODIFIED) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{qnaTitle},#{qnaContent}, 0, NOW() ,NOW())

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()+1
INSERT INTO QNA_REPLY (QNA_NO, MEMBER_ID, QNA_REPLY_CONTENT, QNA_REPLY_CREATED, QNA_REPLY_STATE, QNA_REPLY_DEPTH, QNA_REPLY_GROUP_NO, QNA_REPLY_GROUP_ORD) VALUES (#{qnaNo}, #{memberId}, #{qnaReplyContent}, NOW(), 1, 0, #{qnaReplyNo}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT QNA_REPLY_NO, QNA_NO, MEMBER_ID, QNA_REPLY_CONTENT, QNA_REPLY_CREATED, QNA_REPLY_STATE, QNA_REPLY_DEPTH, QNA_REPLY_GROUP_NO, QNA_REPLY_GROUP_ORD FROM QNA_REPLY WHERE QNA_NO = #{qnaNo} ORDER BY QNA_REPLY_GROUP_NO DESC, QNA_REPLY_GROUP_ORD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_REPLY (QNA_NO, MEMBER_ID, QNA_REPLY_CONTENT, QNA_REPLY_CREATED, QNA_REPLY_STATE, QNA_REPLY_DEPTH, QNA_REPLY_GROUP_NO, QNA_REPLY_GROUP_ORD) VALUES (#{qnaNo}, #{memberId}, #{qnaReplyContent}, NOW(), 1, #{qnaReplyDepth}, #{qnaReplyGroupNo}, #{qnaReplyGroupOrd})
